metadata.title: CVE-2020-25700 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In moodle, some database module web services allowed students to addentries within groups they did not belong to. Versions affected: 3.9 to3.9.2, 3.8 to 3.8.5, 3.7 to 3.7.8, 3.5 to 3.5.14 and earlier unsupportedversions. This is fixed in moodle 3.8.6, 3.7.9, 3.5.15, and 3.10.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
